#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
ll a[200][200];
int main()
{
    int test;
    cin>>test;
    for(int z=1; z <=test;z++)
    {
        int m,n;
        cin>>m>>n;
        ll mini,minj,minval=100000;
        for(int i =1;i <= m;i++)
        {
            for(int j=1;j <= n;j++)
            {
                cin>>a[i][j];
                if(a[i][j] < minval)
                {
                    minval=a[i][j];
                    mini=i;
                    minj=j;
                }
          }
        }
        for(int j=1;j <= n;j++)
        {
            a[m+1][j]=2147483647;
        }
        for(int i =1;i <= m;i++)
        {
            a[i][n+1]=2147483647;
        }
        ll inf = 2147483647;
        ll count = 0 ,i=mini,j=minj;
        while(1)
        {
            if(a[i+1][j] == inf && a[i][j+1] == inf)
            {
                break;
            }
            if(a[i+1][j] > a[i][j+1])j++;
            else i++;
            count++;
        }
        cout<<count<<endl;
    }
}
